snippet.title: Cityscapes: Sim Builder - Gameplay Trailer - Take on the Role as Mayor! (Apple Arcade)
snippet.description: Cityscapes: Sim Builder, a brand new, sustainable take on city-building games, with all the depth of PC, optimised for mobile and built exclusively for Apple Arcade. The game is the first city-builder on Apple Arcade and is accessible on iPhone, iPad, Mac and Apple TV. It is brought to you by Magic Fuel Games, a team of city-builder experts, with a background working for the superhero of simulation games
